meanings.definition: Moving upward or rising in position.
meanings.sent1: The hot air balloon was on an ascending journey into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The hiker followed the ascending trail to reach the mountain peak.
meanings.sent3: The ascending elevator made the passengers feel like they were flying.
meanings.sent4: Her grades were on an ascending path, showing improvement each semester.
meanings.sent5: The kite soared in an ascending motion, carried by the wind.

meanings.sent1: The company experienced an ascending growth in profits this quarter.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's ascending popularity led to more endorsement deals.
meanings.sent3: The cake's ascending layers made it look like a delicious tower.
meanings.sent4: His ascending role in the project earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent5: The tree's ascending branches provided shade on hot days.

meanings.definition: Arranged in order from lowest to highest.
meanings.sent1: The ascending numbers on the chart indicated progress.
meanings.sent2: The books on the shelf were in ascending order based on their publication dates.
meanings.sent3: The ascending prices of the concert tickets made her reconsider attending.
meanings.sent4: The students lined up in an ascending height order for the class photo.
meanings.sent5: The medals were displayed in an ascending order of achievement.
